targets.query:
initiative_counters
| where initiativeId != "68dd003ccce8c534d1da22bc"
| project 
    BudgetTotale = initiativeBudgetCents / 100,
    Speso = spentInitiativeBudgetCents / 100,
    Riservato = reservedInitiativeBudgetCents / 100,
    Residuo = residualInitiativeBudgetCents / 100

let lastTx = transaction
| summarize arg_max(trxDate, rewardCountersInitiativeBudgetCents, rewardCountersTotalRewardCents) by userId;
let lastWallet = wallet
| where status == "REFUNDABLE"
| summarize arg_max(updateDate, amountCents) by userId
| join kind=leftouter lastTx on userId
| project userId, 
          voucherUsed = iff(amountCents == 0, true, false),
          voucherAmountUsed = iff(amountCents != 0, amountCents, rewardCountersTotalRewardCents);
lastWallet
| summarize
    TotalUsers = count(),
    VoucherUsedCount = countif(voucherUsed == true),
    VoucherNotUsedCount = countif(voucherUsed == false),
    TotalAmountSpent = sumif(voucherAmountUsed, voucherUsed == true) / 100

onboarding_citizen
| where initiativeId == "68dd003ccce8c534d1da22bc" 
| summarize cnt = count() by channel, status
| evaluate pivot(status, sum(cnt))
| order by channel asc

transaction
| join kind=inner (point_of_sales) on $left.pointOfSaleId == $right._id
| summarize trxCount = count() by region, status
| evaluate pivot(status, sum(trxCount), region)
| order by region asc
| limit 10

transaction
| summarize trxCount = count() by bin(trxDate, $granularita), status
| evaluate pivot(status, sum(trxCount), trxDate)
| order by trxDate asc

panels.title: Trend temporale delle tipologia di transazioni

targets.query:
['timeline']
| where operationType == "ONBOARDING"
| summarize count() by bin(operationDate, $granularita)
| render timechart

['timeline']
| where operationType == "TRANSACTION"
| summarize count() by bin(operationDate, $granularita)
| render timechart

['timeline']
| where operationType == "UNSUBSCRIBED"
| summarize count() by bin(operationDate, $granularita)
| render timechart

transaction
| where amountCents > 0
| summarize TransazioniPerFascia = count() by ImportoFascia = bin(amountCents / 100, 10)
| order by ImportoFascia asc

initiative_counters
| where initiativeId != "$initiativeId"
| extend 
    Speso = spentInitiativeBudgetCents,
    Riservato = reservedInitiativeBudgetCents
| extend 
    // Calcoliamo la percentuale di completamento reale
    Efficienza = (todouble(Speso) / (Speso + Riservato)) * 100
| project Efficienza

onboarding_citizen
| where initiativeId == "$initiativeId"
| summarize 
    RichiesteTotali = count(),
    UtentiAttivi = countif(status == "ONBOARDING_OK"),
    InCoda = countif(status == "ON_EVALUATION")
| extend 
    TassoAccettazione = round((todouble(UtentiAttivi) / RichiesteTotali) * 100, 1)
| project TassoAccettazione, InCoda

let StartTime = unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(tolong($__from));
let EndTime = unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(tolong($__to));
let Interval = $granularita;
onboarding_citizen
| where initiativeId == "$initiativeId"
| where updateDate between (StartTime .. EndTime)
| make-series 
    RichiesteTotali = count(),
    UtentiAttivi = countif(status == "ONBOARDING_OK"), 
    InCoda = countif(status == "ON_EVALUATION"),
    Rifiutati = countif(status in ("ONBOARDING_KO", "JOINED")),
    Scaduti = countif(status == "UNSUBSCRIBED")
    on updateDate from StartTime to EndTime step Interval
| mv-expand updateDate, RichiesteTotali, UtentiAttivi, InCoda, Rifiutati, Scaduti
| extend updateDate = todatetime(updateDate),
    RichiesteTotali = tolong(RichiesteTotali),
    UtentiAttivi = tolong(UtentiAttivi),
    InCoda = tolong(InCoda),
    Rifiutati = tolong(Rifiutati),
    Scaduti = tolong(Scaduti)

let StartTime = unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(tolong($__from));
let EndTime = unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(tolong($__to));
let Interval = $granularita;
['transaction']
| where isnotempty(trxChargeDate)
| where trxChargeDate between (StartTime .. EndTime)
| make-series 
    TransazioniTotali = count(),
    Autorizzate = countif(status == "AUTHORIZED"), 
    Catturate = countif(status == "CAPTURED"),
    Fatturate = countif(status == "INVOICED"),
    Annullate = countif(status == "CANCELLED"),
    Stornate = countif(status == "REFUNDED")
    on trxChargeDate from StartTime to EndTime step Interval
| mv-expand trxChargeDate, TransazioniTotali, Autorizzate, Catturate, Fatturate, Annullate, Stornate
| extend updateDate = todatetime(trxChargeDate),
    TransazioniTotali = tolong(TransazioniTotali),
    Autorizzate = tolong(Autorizzate),
    Catturate = tolong(Catturate),
    Fatturate = tolong(Fatturate),
    Annullate = tolong(Annullate),
    Stornate = tolong(Stornate)
| render timechart

initiative_counters
| where initiativeId != "68dd003ccce8c534d1da22bc"
| extend 
    BudgetTotale = initiativeBudgetCents / 100.0,
    Speso = spentInitiativeBudgetCents / 100.0,
    Riservato = reservedInitiativeBudgetCents / 100.0,
    Residuo = residualInitiativeBudgetCents / 100.0
| extend 
    // Calcoliamo quanto Ã¨ "pieno" il bucket
    Perc_Speso = ((Speso) / BudgetTotale) * 100,
    // Creiamo uno stato logico per la Dashboard
    Stato_Budget = case(
        Residuo < 1000, "SATURO", 
        Residuo < 1000000, "IN ESAURIMENTO", 
        "DISPONIBILE"
    )
| project BudgetTotale, Speso, Riservato, Residuo, Perc_Speso, Stato_Budget
